meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of granodiorite.
meanings.sent1: The mountain was made of granodioritic rocks, giving it a unique appearance.
meanings.sent2: The geologist identified the granodioritic composition of the rock sample.
meanings.sent3: The granodioritic boulder seemed to have a personality of its own, always standing out in the landscape.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as solid and enduring as a granodioritic structure.
meanings.sent5: The granodioritic texture of the wall felt rough and sturdy to the touch.

meanings.definition: Composed mainly of quartz, plagioclase feldspar, and biotite or hornblende.
meanings.sent1: The granodioritic minerals in the rock sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The construction material had a granodioritic quality that made it durable.
meanings.sent3: The chef's cake was a masterpiece, with a granodioritic layer of frosting on top.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as clear and structured as a granodioritic formation.
meanings.sent5: The granodioritic elements in the painting added depth and richness to the colors.
